site-address: 190 Lower Road, Hullbridge, SS5 6BD
ownership: not owned by a public authority
notes: The site falls within the Metropolitan Green Belt and any redevelopment would therefore be subject to the provisions of Paragraph 145(g) of the NPPF. The quoted capacity of this site is without consideration of how redevelopment would impact on openness and is based on a density assumption of 30 dwellings per hectare. The estimated capacity of the site is therefore without prejudice to further consideration of the appropriate density of the site, such as would be required through a planning application
